name: Frozen Solid
description: You’ve been trapped in a block of ice!
resist: The block of ice has 5 HP with a Def & SpDef score of 2. At the end of the round the subject may try to break the Ice with a move. Moves that are super-effective against Ice types break it instantly.
effect: The subject cannot perform any action. Ice-type Pokémon are immune.
duration: Until the ice is broken or finally melts on its own after a few hours. The frozen subject will be found Fainted if left to thaw on its own.
